description:
Ritsuka introduces Mafuyu to his other bandmates, Haruki Nakayama and Akihiko Kaji. After some convincing from the other two, Ritsuka finally agrees to teach Mafuyu how to play guitar. Mafuyu is so excited about playing guitar for the first time that he canâ€™t hide his excitement. One day, Haruki and Akihiko tell Mafuyu the most important thing about playing music...
Source: crunchyroll
